d56ee992-5d73-479b-81e1-761795220c20.description: Badge earners can identify the right AI tool for different challenges and opportunities, leverage advances in AI to empower providers and patients, navigate the current and upcoming healthcare industry paradigm changes and complexities, and implement and manage AI projects in healthcare.
d56ee992-5d73-479b-81e1-761795220c20.name: AI Leadership for Healthcare Professional Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by University of Maryland, College Park, Robert H. Smith School of Business

entity.name: University of Maryland, College Park, Robert H. Smith School of Business

badge_template_activities.title: Complete four-course series designed to provide healthcare professionals with an understanding of how AI applications and strategies are being deployed across the core functions of healthcare. Each course consists of 38 contact hours of e-learning content and synchronous sessions.

Complete a self-reflective evaluation after each course. It is an opportunity for the learner to to reflect on their knowledge of the course materials and asses their own ability to apply AI in healthcare.

ac109e77-aed5-4eb8-bc17-a7d23c323038.description: The program is designed to help leaders identify how blockchain technology can enable them to innovate and drive growth in their businesses. Participants may already be familiar with applications of blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies and non-fungible tokens (NFTs), which rely on peer-to-peer networks.
ac109e77-aed5-4eb8-bc17-a7d23c323038.name: The Blockchain Business Imperative

issuer.summary: issued by University of Maryland, College Park, Robert H. Smith School of Business

entity.name: University of Maryland, College Park, Robert H. Smith School of Business

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the 6-week online synchronous course.

Submission of a white paper that identifies a business need in a participant's organization or a hypothetical business need and outlines the pros and cons of leverage blockchain technology as a solution.

c65bc429-4687-463c-acba-384b48fbdb43.description: The Maryland Smith AI for Business Leaders program is designed for business leaders who seek to leverage AI/ML to improve their business. The goal is to help learners build a deeper appreciation for the possibilities of AI while recognizing its limitations and potential pitfalls.
c65bc429-4687-463c-acba-384b48fbdb43.name: AI/ML for Business Leaders Professional Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by University of Maryland, College Park, Robert H. Smith School of Business

entity.name: University of Maryland, College Park, Robert H. Smith School of Business

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earner has completed 33 hours of continuing education credits. This badge verifies that they viewed and participated in each of the six modules included in the program.
